linkDescriptions.facebook: Connect with friends and the world around you.
linkDescriptions.twitter: See what's happening in the world right now.
linkDescriptions.instagram: Share your life through photos and videos.
linkDescriptions.bbc: Trusted world and UK news as well as local and regional perspectives.
linkDescriptions.cnn: Breaking news, latest stories, and video from around the world.
linkDescriptions.theGuardian: Latest news, sport, business, comment, analysis and reviews.
linkDescriptions.techCrunch: The latest technology news and information on startups.
linkDescriptions.wired: In-depth coverage of current and future trends in technology.
linkDescriptions.theVerge: Covering the intersection of technology, science, art, and culture.
